"Thank goodness the two of you returned: "...Bruder is currently undergoing treatment."

"Thankfully, his wounds aren't too severe.
He should be able to return in short time."
"...Thank goodness."
"And what of the other ARKS out there?"
"...They didn't make it."
"So... that was the Starless then."

"To think they could take out two battle parties,
and they got the better of even Bruder..."

"...Given what we've seen, we can hardly afford to
underestimate our enemy."

"However, this more than confirms the existence of
the Starless as a new threat."
"We must make all due haste in preparation to fight against them."

"...This isn't when I thought I'd be saying this,
but I'd like to talk about your future."

"With the intent of raising morale for our future battles,
I'd like you to become a symbol for ARKS everywhere."
"A symbol?"
"What do you mean?"

"The deciding factor of every major battle that's happened
in recent memory has been none other than you."
"Even just now, you were a major factor in fighting off those Starless."

"And so I would like you to become known
as the protector of Halpha."
"I want you to become its... \"Guardian\"."

"...Although it sounds grand, I merely ask that you
continue what you've already been doing."

"Just as you always have, I want you to continue defeating enemies,
and keep helping those who are in trouble."
"Through your actions, make it known that you are our hope."
"So... what's different?"
"So I just don a title?"
"Titles are crucial during these times."

"Everyone will be pinning their hopes on you,
and it may seem overwhelming."

"But I would like you to be the one to take on
that important role."
"Alright. You can count on me."
"...I'll try my best."
"Thank you. I'm counting on you."

"I'll be giving the both of you your next mission shortly.
First though, I'll be rushing to analyze your combat logs."

"Aina really did have the right of it.
Let's fight for our \"tomorrows\"."
